name: Kobold Slayers
description:
Disclamer: don't expect much, lol

You control two novice adventurers - a wizard Catherine Belorse and a fighter Eleanor Durand on their quest of exterminating kobolds that invaded some noble's garden. 

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - camera control
  • Space - pass turn

All characters (as well as some art) are from Rise of the White Flower by Necro Bunny Studios.

Cover image by Hastings
